Name: Beholder Shock
Desc:
The Beholder screams, stunning and inflicting damage on surrounding enemies.
Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Lv. 10 effect: Can learn the 3rd Job Skill, Beholder Shock II.

H.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 150% Damage 6 times, with 45% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
H.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 150% Damage 6 times, with a 45% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec. on hit.
Cooldown: 12 sec.

h1.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 150% Damage 6 times, with 45% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
h1.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 150% Damage 6 times, with a 45% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec. on hit.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
